com.xrtb.db

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xrtb.db.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that makes a simple database for use by the Campaign admin portal
    Author:
    Ben M. Faul

                                            java.lang.String id)
        Given the name of the user and the adId, return the campaign as a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        name - String. The name of the user.
        id - String. The adId of the campaign.
        Returns:
        String. The campaign represented as a JSON string.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • createStub

        public Campaign createStub(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String id)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Create a stub campaign from 'stub.json'
        Parameters:
        name - String. The user name.
        id - String. The adId to use for this campaign.
        Returns:
        Campaign. The campaign that was created.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on file errors.

      • update

        Update the user map in the global map
        Parameters:
        u - User. The user object to put into global context.

      • editCampaign

        public void editCampaign(java.lang.String name,
                         Campaign c)
        Given the user name. edit the campaign of this user with the provided campaign (adId is the key).
        Parameters:
        name - String. The user name.
        c - Campaign. The campaign you will use as the source of the changes.

      • getAllCampaigns

        public java.util.List getAllCampaigns()
        Return a list of all campaigns in the database, irrespective of user.
        Returns:
        List. The campaigns in the database.

      • deleteCampaign

        public java.util.List deleteCampaign(User u,
                                     java.lang.String adId)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete a campaign for the specified user, of the provided adId
        Parameters:
        u - User. The user record to edit.
        adId - String. The adid of the campaign to delete.
        Returns:
        List. The resulting list of campaigns of this user.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on file errors.

      • editCampaign

        public void editCampaign(User u,
                         Campaign c)
        Edit a campaign in the user. The campaign object (of the same adId) in the user object is replaced by this campaign/
        Parameters:
        u - User. The user record to edit.
        c - Campaign. The campaign that replaces the campaign in user of the same adId.

      • read

        public java.util.List<User> read(java.lang.String db)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Read the database.json file into this object.
        Parameters:
        db - String. The name of the JSON database file to read
        Returns:
        List. A list of user objects in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on file errors.

      • write

        public void write()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Write the database object to the database.json file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - on file errors.
